search.query: | inputlookup fb_hostname_index_cache | stats count by orig_host

| rest /services/admin/cacheman splunk_server=$host$* | rex field=title "^(?<cache_type>[^\|]+)\|(?<index>[^~]+)~" | sistats count, sum(cm:bucket.estimated_size), max(cm:bucket.latest_time), min(cm:bucket.earliest_time) by splunk_server, cache_type, index, cm:bucket.status
| rest /services/configs/conf-server/cachemanager splunk_server=$host$* | replace "lru" WITH "Least Recently Used" IN eviction_policy
| stats count by index | sum(count) AS count
| rest /services/data/indexes splunk_server=$host$* | where isnotnull(remotePath) | stats count by title | table title | rename title AS Index
| rest /services/data/indexes splunk_server=$host$* | stats count by remotePath | table remotePath | rename remotePath AS "Remote Path"
| stats sum(cm:bucket.estimated_size) AS size by cm:bucket.status
